PHRASE.LANG: LMO - Xi ホバーボード

This hoverboard will allow your avatar to float on air and zoom around with increased speed. This item also comes complete with a fantastic 'Ollie' emote animation. Speed: ◆◆◆◆◆ \n LMO (Locomotion) is a Portable item. [#Legal]
